name: ZAPPA 7.5
treatmentDescriptions: Acute and maintenance treatment of Schizophrenia. Zappa is indicated for the management of the manifestations of psychotic disorders. Zappa is indicated for the short-term treatment of acute manic episodes associated with Bipolar I Disorder.Prevention of recurrence in Bipolar  Disorder: In patients whose manic episode has responded to Olanzapine treatment Zappa is indicated for the prevention of reccurence in patients with Bipolar Disorder. Combination therapy in Bipolar I Disorder: The combination of Zappa with lithium or valproate is indicated for the short-term treatment of acute manic episodes associated with Bipolar I Disorder.
warnings: תרופה מוגבלת לרישום ע'י רופא מומחה או הגבלה אחרת
